"Your back is extra strong from carrying rookies"\n \nIncreases your carry weight by +4kg

"Gotta walk fast..
Don't want to be late for that meeting"
 
Increases your movement speed by 6%
Reduces carry weight by 1kg

Don't want to get caught out in an emission"
 
Increases your sprint speed by 8%
Reduces carry weight by 3%
"Your skin has hardened from wrestling mutants"\n \nYou take 10% less damage from mutant hits
"Why waste bullets when you can just stab?"\n \nYou deal 15% more melee damage to mutants
"The traders of your faction are always happy to see you"\n \nYou get +5% better prices at traders of your own faction
"You know how to haggle with strangers"\n \nYou get +5% better prices at traders that are not your of your faction
"Your mind isn't quite the same as when you first entered the zone.."\n \nYou take 25% less damage from controllers' psy attacks
"You wouldn't have to fix your armour so often if you just don't get hit"\n \nYou have +15% higher chance to not spend a use of your repair kit when repairing body armour and helmets
"Killing tushkanos on full auto takes it's toll on a weapon"\n \nYou have +15% higher chance to not spend a use of your repair kit when repairing weapons
"Congratulations, you found the cure for bullet holes"\n \nWhen using a medical item you gain +10% of the total health and radiation restored as a quick boost
"Grab a handful of bullets and just shove them in there"\n \nLoading bullets into a magazine goes +25% faster
"Compulsively unloading every magazine you find seems like a good idea to you"\n \nUnloading bullets from magazines goes +30% faster
"What's in the box?"\n \nLock difficulty on lootboxes is reduced by 10%

"You really don't have to pick up every single piece of loot.."
 
Increases your carry weight by +10%
Reduces your sprint speed by 5%
"Pulling out your knife somehow makes even explosions hurt less"\n \nYou take 20% less damage from physical hits while you are holding a melee weapon
"Who needs friends anyway?"\n \nWhen you don't have any companions, your carry weight is increased by 5kg and you take 10% less damage
"Exploring the zone is safer when you have cannon fod-.. squad members!"\n \nYour companions deal 15% more damage and take 25% less damage
"You sling guns.. and magazines"\n \nYou reload pistols and sub-machine guns +25% faster
"You really don't have to reload mid combat after firing only 2 bullets from a 30 round magazine.."\n \nYou reload rifles, snipers and shotguns +15% faster
"Remember, switching to your pistol is always faster than reloading"\n \nYou holster non-pistols +25% faster and equip pistols +50% faster
"Carefully cutting the mutant corpse to get the most use of it"\n \nYou have 50% chance to get an additional mutant part when skinning
"Stalkers envy your pristinely kept equipment"\n \nYou have +25% higher chance to not spend a use of your repair kit when repairing parts and tools

"AAAAAAAHHH!"
 
You gain faster movement for 10 seconds when taking damage
Up to +25% faster

The Pain Rush buff also grants up to 5% stamina regen per second
Pain Rush lasts 5 seconds longer
"I ain't got time to bleed"\n \nKilling stalkers and mutants reduces bleeding by up to 5% over 10 seconds
